rooms.Name: Entrance to a Large Mansion
rooms.Description:
You appear on the steps of a large mansion with strange and intriguing
lights in the windows.  You can go north to the door of the mansion or go
back to the south through the Portal!
A sign catches your eye!  It reads....
WARNING!!!!  DO NOT GO IN HERE IF UNDER LEVEL 100!!!

rooms.Name: Door to a Large Mansion
rooms.Description:
This is the front door to the mansion of Professor Xavier, and the common
home/headquarters for those Uncanny X-Men.  Your curiosity is bubbling
but you also fear what you may find!

rooms.Name: Main Hall of the Xavier Mansion
rooms.Description:
It is a really large entrance foyer that you have walked into, it gives those
entering time to put away their coats, sticks, weapons, boots, and the like
It has stairs going up in front of you and the hall continues east and west.

rooms.Name: Stairway
rooms.Description:
A spiraling staircase leading to the second floor, nothing to spectacular 
about this particular staircase, but you better watch your step, there's no
telling what kinda surprises the X-Men could have up their sleeves.

rooms.Name: North-Eastern Hall of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
A extravagant hall with pictures and murals of great warriors but they are
somehow different, almost mutated.  the hall continues north and there is a
door to the east!

rooms.Name: North-Western Hall of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
More intriguing pictures line the walls and battles of old appear to decorate
the already lavish walls that appear to have a marble look to them!

rooms.Name: Before the Dead End
rooms.Description:
More intriguing pictures line the walls and battles of old appear to decorate
the already lavish walls that appear to have a marble look to them!

rooms.Name: Dead-End
rooms.Description: It is a end to the hall this way, perhaps it would be better to not get cornered in by anything in this huge house!

rooms.Name: North-Western Hall of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
This hall just seems to go on endlessly but you swear you can smell something
cooking, you can almost smell the spices!!!

rooms.Name: Outside the Kitchen
rooms.Description:
The hall does have an end!!  And its by the kitchen...you can hear
someone complaining about trying to clean up Gumbo!!!!

rooms.Name: The Kitchen
rooms.Description:
You are standing in a space age kitchen that has become a disaster area.  There
is crap lying everywhere.  Pots and pans are strewn about the floor, as well
as chunks of whatever is being cooked.  As you survey the room closely, you
realize that a man is cooking here, and cussing as you have never heard.

rooms.Name: West of the Main Hall
rooms.Description:
There are exits to the north, east and west.  To the east is the main hall,
north takes you through another hallway, and the west you hear some vague
noise of maybe a tv.

rooms.Name: Hallway in the Mansion
rooms.Description:
The hallway goes east and west, a common direction you have noticed.  Nothing
is really standing out other than the fact this place is REALLY BIG!!!!
You hear noise to the west, someone arguing about the remote or something.

rooms.Name: Intersection in the Hall
rooms.Description:
You can go either north or west from here, you can hear those ramblings to
the west getting louder and you wonder what is going on here.  Your curiosity
is overwhelming!!!

ExtraDescs.Description:
You see rows and rows of classical books.  One book seems to stand out among
the others.  It is called the CURRENT EXPLOITS of the XMEN.  Pull to enter.
whoa, a clue to the secret test lab and rec areas of the mutants.

WOW, HOLY CRAP, a FRIGGIN PAINTING :P
You should really look at the BOOKSHELF

It is lying here in a neat order.  It is all conspicuously pointing toward
the bookshelf
HINT HINT

rooms.Name: Hallway of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
You can smell something from the north and you hear something from the west.
The battle for the remote is continuing as you hear crashes and battle noises.
At least that is your thoughts as you hear "I WANNA WATCH OPRAH!"

rooms.Name: End of the Hall
rooms.Description:
The end of the hall leaves you with two choices north or south.
North, you can hear the ramblings of a TV commercial, and there is silence
from the south, maybe this should be checked out!

rooms.Name: Observation Lounge
rooms.Description:
There is a big bay window in this room for you to stare out onto the land.
The whole yard can be seen here, there are also chairs and couches to relax
on.

rooms.Name: The Main Living Room of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
There are a couple worn in couches and chairs, it appears this room is used
quite often, it has a very relaxing atmosphere, you feel the need to sit
down and enjoy the tv that is on and kick back for a while.

ExtraDescs.Description: You try and make it out, you just can't see it...

rooms.Name: Dining Hall of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
This is where the X-Men break bread at the end of a hard day!  It would not
be wise to interfere with any part of their dining practices!!!
Exits to the east and west are visual.

rooms.Name: Another Hallway of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
The hall continues north and there is a dining hall to the west. You smell
something odd from the dining room, maybe you should order a pizza, or just
go on ahead north!

rooms.Name: Another Hallway of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
The hallway is getting darker and more narrow as you move, it feels like the
walls are closing in! You can continue north or go back south, however your
curiousity is pulling you north to see what is at the end of this hall!

rooms.Name: Corner of the Hallway
rooms.Description:
It is dark and creepy in this part of the hallway, you can almost feel eyes
watching you from every shadow!  You can feel the warm breath of something
on your neck!  As your eyes adjust you see a camera in the upper corner!

rooms.Name: Hallway to the Library
rooms.Description:
It is still pitch black but you can make out a door frame at the end of the
hall to the west, the feeling of dread is semi past as you walk towards the
west, but it returns if you go east!

rooms.Name: Library of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
There are bookshelves to be sure here, loaded with books for everyone in the
Xavier's School for the Gifted.  You notice all the books are remarkable in
that each one is so clean except one, might be a reason!

rooms.Name: Hidden Command Center for the X-Men
rooms.Description:
The brain of the mansion, a huge super computer with monitors everywhere.
You notice that dark hallway on one of them, that explains the feeling of
being watched! This is usually Professor X's main stay!

rooms.Name: Side Hallway
rooms.Description:
A side hallway with a long stretch going north, you are not sure where it goes
however in a place as big as this, it has got to be an adventure!

rooms.Name: Side Hallway
rooms.Description:
The hallway continues north and south, it is dimly lit, but you can hear some
noise and other racket that sounds of metal and concrete meeting!

rooms.Name: Side Hallway
rooms.Description:
The hall continues to run north and south, you can still faintly hear noise
from the north, but you cannot tell what exactly it is!  You can see some
scrathes along the wall, looks like Wolverine frequents this route!

rooms.Name: Back Hallway Intersection
rooms.Description:
The hallway comes to a T-intersection, you hear running water and a steamy
fog is coming from the east, and there is the sound of grunting to the west
that would tell you to be cautious!

rooms.Name: Back Hallway of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
This hallway has a musty type of odor to it, but not to bad that you can't
continue.  You can go try your luck at the weight room of the X-Men or you
can take your girly self back east!

rooms.Name: Back Hallway of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
You are in a back hallway of the mansion, the size of this place is incredible
You can see gym equipment to the north and the hallways continues to the west.

rooms.Name: Gymnasium of the Uncanny X-Men
rooms.Description:
This is no ordinary Gymnasium, you can tell by the strange and utterly devious
looking equipment in this room.  There are things here that look more like
torture devices than exercise equipment, but these are the X-Men!

rooms.Name: Back Hallway of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
This like the rest of the back hallway doesn't have anything to intriguing,
but there is a work-out gym to the north, you hope you don't interrupt any
lessons or you may be the next example!!!!

rooms.Name: Work-Out Room of the X-Men
rooms.Description:
This room is slightly less deadly than the room next door, but you notice
marks on the wall where it appears some of the lessons might have gotten out
of hand, you wonder when the next lesson is!

rooms.Name: Back Hallway of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
The hall goes east and west, and the fog is getting a lil thicker but you
can still see where you are going quite easily.  The temperature is rising
as well, you wonder what is down this hall and should you find out?

rooms.Name: Back Hallway of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
It is getting warmer every step you take but it is more of a relaxing heat
it is soothing your muscles that are sore from your combat of the day!
You feel the need to go find out where this refreshing steam is from!

rooms.Name: Back Hallway of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
You see the end of the hall to the east and you can always go back west.
The steamy fog is a little more light here and cooler air can be felt!
You also can smell the scent of chlorine from somewhere!

rooms.Name: Back Hallway of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
This end of the hallway has a distinct odor of chlorine and running water can
be heard north as well, you wonder what kind of water sports the X-Men take
part in, and if it is safe!

rooms.Name: Relaxation Quad
rooms.Description: This is the room that adjoins all the relaxation rooms of the mansion!

rooms.Name: The Pool
rooms.Description:
This is an olympic sized pool with a strong odor of chlorine and it looks like
some of the water sports here have gotten a lil rough, there are scratches on
the sides of the pool.

rooms.Name: The Hot-Tub of the Mansion
rooms.Description:
A larger than usual hot-tub, I guess to fit some of the other larger "gifted"
students here at Professor X's school.  It is nice and warm and the water 
calls to your battle racked body!

rooms.Name: Steam Room
rooms.Description:
You can hardly see when you enter, but your eyes quickly adjust.  It is the
steam room where the X-Men can lose some tension and maybe get a rub down
after the long hard battles.

rooms.Name: Flight of Stairs
rooms.Description:
A spiraling staircase that leads downward to the first floor.  It is carpeted
and is very old looking but well kept.  You still might want to watch your
step on the way down!

rooms.Name: Wolverine's Bedroom
rooms.Description:
With scratches all over the walls, and the shredded picture of Cyclops, you 
can make the assumption this is Wolverine's room.  His hate for how Cyclops
got Jean has made him bitter, but still a worthy ally.

rooms.Name: Storm's Bedroom
rooms.Description:
This is obviously Storm's bedroom, there is a clothes closet the size of some
bedrooms, and the fact the air in this room is so comfortable shows its
owners control of the environment!

rooms.Name: Dead End of the 2nd Floor
rooms.Description:
The end of the hallway where it seems a good hiding spot to jump those coming
up the stairs, it is also the darkest corner of the mansion.

rooms.Name: Cyclops' Room
rooms.Description:
A picture on a nightstand by the bed of Jean Grey tells you this is Cyclops'
room, and there are plans and maps of past and future missions scattered all
about the room, it appears he takes his duties VERY seriously, you better go!

rooms.Name: Jean's Room
rooms.Description:
Although she is rarely here, and when she is it is not alone, this is her room
and she likes it left undisturbed, so I advise leaving before her or Cyclops
stops in for something!

rooms.Name: Nightcrawler's Bedroom
rooms.Description:
You have NO idea what has lived here, and from the looks of the door it has 
never been opened!!!  Whoever lives here must have a pretty neat way of 
getting around the mansion!

rooms.Name: Steps to the 3rd Floor
rooms.Description:
Yet another spiraling staircase leading upwards further...You fear what else
the mansion may have yet to discourage you with!  This is not a place for the
timid!!!

rooms.Name: Rogue's Bedroom
rooms.Description:
A quaint little piece of south is in the room, you can sense it!  There is
pictures of Mardi Gras and other southern events that you don't recognize.
And you can also see a picture of Gambit tucked away on a dresser!

rooms.Name: Gambit's Room
rooms.Description:
A room filled with playing cards everywhere, but none more seen than the Ace
of Spades, you assume the owners calling card!!  There is a picture of Rogue
on a dresser in the corner and the smell of Gumbo in the air!

rooms.Name: Beast's Abode
rooms.Description:
There is a endless supply of books in this room!!!  The owner is quite
the scholar and takes great pride in his library of sorts...however smaller
than the Mansion's library still a handsome collection!

rooms.Name: A REALLY BIG ROOM!!!!!
rooms.Description:
This room was obviously made for the largest and strongest of the X-Men, and
they made this room none to weak, it has a metal on the walls that looks like
it could withstand a tank blast close range!!!!

rooms.Name: Jubilee's Room
rooms.Description:
A room with a few knicks in it!  A FEW???  Who are we kidding, it looks like
someone hasn't mastered their special talent yet, this room has more holes
than a screen.  At least the door was made solid and hasn't blown up yet!

rooms.Name: Stairs
rooms.Description:
Stairs spiraling downward to the second floor, and after hearing some of the
sounds and screams from this floor you feel like going down more and more!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!

A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through, however you hears noises to the
east, but that just might be what you don't want!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through, but there is noises even louder
coming from around you, you can't see anything but it is close!!!

rooms.Name: THE DANGER ROOM
rooms.Description:
This is the REAL DEAL, there are no games in this room, it's all or nothing.
You will have to be extra cautious or extra dead! The X-Men made this room
to hone their powers, can you survive? We shall see!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Name: Maze of the Danger Room
rooms.Description:
A baffling array of rooms that has no apparent direction that is correct!
You will have to guess your way through!

rooms.Name: Magneto's Simulation
rooms.Description:
This is the simulation with the king of all evil mutants!  The X-Men made this
simulation for one reason, to add all the new techniques they encounter from
Magneto to it so they can be ready and train for when they battle!

rooms.Name: Juggernaut's Simulation
rooms.Description:
This simulation pits you against the X-Men's favorite ramming dim-witted
sometimes, foe.  He is a tough sim to beat, but the X-Men can do it, so can
you if you are strong enough, Good Luck!

rooms.Name: Basic Simulation
rooms.Description:
This is a basic simulation filled with terrors and booby traps for the X-Men,
made to help them count on agility and fighting teamed together, this is 
still a formiddable room, and do not underestimate it!

rooms.Name: A storage attic
rooms.Description:
As you look around you see a room filled with old discarded memories that
Jean is trying to forget, and when you look you see something glowing in
the corner.  What could it be, it appears to be OH NO, it is the DARK Phoenix
and it never left Jean's side, it has just been hiding here awaiting to be
discovered by her again, maybe this is hy Jean never comes up here, she knows
and keeps the door locked...you had beeter run before it absorbs your soul!
